ing: 1 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Fresh tomato salsa is excellent with just chips and salsa for an appetizer or a perfect compliment to any Mexican dish. Adjust to personal taste with salt, pepper, and ground cumin.  Add 1 additional serrano pepper to make hot salsa, and 2 serrano peppers for 'fire' salsa."
ins: Stir tomatoes, garlic, serrano pepper, jalapeno pepper, white onion, green bell pepper, cilantro, cumin, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl.
